description: Try our easy to follow Tuna & White Beans With Olives recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tuna & White Beans With Olives Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 about black olives, pitted and halved

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the beans into a large bowl along with the tuna. Add the vinegar, taste, and season well with salt and black pepper.

Add the remaining ingredients, and stir through thoroughly. Taste, and season again if needed. Serve immediately, or put in the refrigerator for a couple of hours until needed. If making ahead, bring back to room temperature before serving.
